title: 权限组如何设置
txt_content: 我想弄一个VIP权限组，给这个权限组加上飞行，请问哪位大神能教教我怎么弄

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
mangadd vip
mangaddi vip builder
mangaddv vip build true
mangaddp vip essentials.fly

replies.author: TOOy
replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-8-19 17:40
mangadd vip
mangaddi vip builder
mangaddv vip build true
这段文字要加在那个节点

replies.author: jiuerd
TOOy
replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-8-20 15:25
这是指令;
后台输入或者游戏中输入(需要权限);
这样打/mangaddp default
mangadd vip
mangaddi vip builder
mangaddv vip build true
mangaddp vip essentials.fly吗?

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
TOOy 发表于 2014-8-20 15:26
这样打/mangaddp default
mangadd vip
mangaddi vip builder
你加一个default组是什么意思?
后台就直接输入;
游戏中就在前面加 /;
